entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
